```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(readr)
GII <- read_csv("~/Downloads/GII.csv")
View(GII)
```
```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
GII <- GII %>%
  select(c("X1","X2","Australia","United States of America","Australia_1","United States of America_1","Australia_2","United States of America_2","Australia_3","United States of America_3"))
```

```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(plyr)
GII<-plyr::rename(GII, c("Australia"="Rank Indicator:Aus", "United States of America"="Rank Indicator:US","Australia_1"="Score:Aus", "United States of America_1"="Score:US","Australia_2"="Value:Aus","United States of America_2"="Value:US","Australia_3"="S/W:Aus","United States of America_3"="S/W:US"))
```

```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
GII[ GII == "n/a"] <- NA
GII[ GII == "N/A"] <- NA
GII[ GII == "NA"] <- NA  
```


```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
GII_indicators <- GII %>%
  slice(1:5)
```


```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
GII_institutions <- GII %>%
  slice(7:18)
```


```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

```

```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

```

```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

```

```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

```

```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

```

```{r, warnings=FALSE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

```
